scripts.install:workspace: meteor npm install && cd npm-packages/meteor-vite && meteor npm install
scripts.build:npm: cd npm-packages/meteor-vite && meteor npm run build
scripts.link:npm: (cd examples/vue && meteor npm link ../../npm-packages/meteor-vite) && (cd examples/svelte && meteor npm link ../../npm-packages/meteor-vite)
scripts.start:vue: meteor npm run build:npm && (cd examples/vue && meteor npm run meteor-vite-internal:start)
scripts.start:svelte: meteor npm run build:npm && (cd examples/svelte && meteor npm run meteor-vite-internal:start)
